remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 3rd paragraph, 3rd line on p. 115.  Show that t ` \/ ` v = p ` \/ ` q implies v = u. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2012.)
statement:
cdleme22.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme22.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme22.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme22.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme22.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme22.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme22aa $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ Q e. A /\ P =/= Q ) /\ ( V e. A /\ V .<_ W /\ V .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> V = U ) $.
